## deifning a fucntion that returns the mean waiting time

def waiting_mean(arrival_time,service_time):
    waiting_time=[]   ## initiate the customer waiting time with empty list
    leaving_time=[]   ## customer leaving time
    
    waiting_time.append(0)   ## waiting time for first customer or first event is zero
    leaving_time.append(arrival_time[0] + service_time[0] + waiting_time[0]) # leaving time of first cust
    
    for i in range(1,len(arrival_time)):  ## filling the waiting & leaving time from 1st cust onwards
        waiting_time.append(max(0, leaving_time[i-1]-arrival_time[i]))  ## waiting time of the 2nd customer
        leaving_time.append(arrival_time[i] + service_time[i] + waiting_time[i])
    
    mean_waiting_time = np.mean(waiting_time)
    return mean_waiting_time
